name: @grec0/dba-mcp
description: Multi-vendor Database MCP Server via Stdio for DevOps & Migration

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run prerelease && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run prerelease && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run prerelease && npm publish --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.postpublish: git add package.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push
